## A digital polyglot: source texts

- use existing editions of Masoretic text, Vulgate, Septuagint, Targum Onkelos
- first digital editions of Latin glosses on Septuagint, Targum

## Morphological analysis

- morphology tailored to corpus
- identifiers for lexemes
- object model of morphological forms

##  Morphological resources

- Hebrew: use existing resources of OSHB project
- Latin, Greek: develop corpus with *Tabulae* system and *Kanones* system
